team.name: Dan Blake
team.bioHtml: Founder, Investor, Board Member. Passionate about helping startups succeed

jobs.title: Technical Co-Founder
jobs.description:
We are two Startup Founders. While we have both managed to help build promising early stage companies, our stories of how we got there are very different.

One of us has been lucky enough to have been constantly supported by a range of experienced founders and advisors, the other has not had so much support.

We don’t think this is fair and want to level the playing field and give more startups the chance to succeed. 

We are looking for a Technical Co-Founder to join us and build our first product. You will be a full stack developer, with experience of building social networks. You will take control of the technical build and have an interest in branding and design. You will put together the MVP that is mobile friendly.

Following launch of the MVP we will refine the product, build a user base and then look to secure significant funding from our network to take the company to the next stage.

We are looking for someone who wants to be a Co-Founder and build a company. We will personally fund the company for the first 6 months. Salary 50k, office space if required and 20% Equity. Pay rise to a sensible level to come post raise.
